history.proof: intros n. hauto use: nat_ind, dt_kill_empty_d_0, dt_kill_empty_d_2.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat d : preDTA a : ad t : term H1 : term_high t <= n H2 : reconnaissance d a t Unable to unify "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= S ?M1851 -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t" with "reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t".

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall n : nat, dt_kill_empty_def_0 n -> dt_kill_empty_def_0 (S n) n : nat d : preDTA a, c : ad tl : term_list H1 : S (term_high_0 tl) <= n ladj : state H0 : MapGet state d a = Some ladj l : prec_list H2 : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H4 : liste_reconnait d l tl Unable to unify "S (term_high_0 tl) <= n" with "reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a (app c tl)".

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d p tl H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d' p tl H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d' p tl' H2 H3 H4.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d' p tl' H2' H3 H4.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d' p tl' H2' H3' H4.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: intros d' p tl' H2' H3' H4'.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall n : nat, dt_kill_empty_def_0 n -> dt_kill_empty_def_0 (S n) n : nat d : preDTA a, c : ad tl : term_list H1 : S (term_high_0 tl) <= n ladj : state H0 : MapGet state d a = Some ladj l : prec_list H2 : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H4 : liste_reconnait d l tl H5 : n = 0 Unable to unify "0 + ?M3650 = ?M3650" with "reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a (app c tl)".

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply dt_kill_empty_d_1 with (d := d) (p := p) (tl := tl) in H2 as [p' [H6 H7]].
exceptions.exn: The reference p was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros d a t H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference H7 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n. unfold dt_kill_empty_def_0. intros d a t H1 H2. apply dt_kill_empty_d_2. apply H1. unfold dt_kill_empty_def_0 in H1. unfold dt_kill_empty_def_0. intros d p tl H2 H3 H4. destruct (Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases n) as [H5 | H5]. - apply Nat.add_0_l. - apply dt_kill_empty_d_1 with (d := d) (p := p) (tl := tl) in H2 as [p' [H6 H7]]. apply H7.
